description:
The Path to Kyorikai, an immersive spiritual realm that accurately recreates the historical & architectural landscapes of medieval Japan. Seamlessly blending genres from walk-through adventures & puzzle games to education & culture into a single cohesive experience. 

Samurai of the Orange Oath serve as an exceptional cohort of the oldest legendary warriors, an exclusive community to be served with special perks & rewards within the Kyorikai ecosystem.
name: The Orange Oath by The Path to Kyorikai
